slap, sq. [[עַל־יׇרֵח]] on the thigh, in remorse and sorrow Je 31:19, Ez Eze 21:17; c. [[כַּפַּיִם]] clap one's hands Nu 24:10 (in anger), c. [[עַל]] at, La 2:15, Job 27:23 (in mockery); ´[[כ]] om. Job 34:37 (in presumptuousness, against God).
slap, chastise, c. acc. pers. Job 34:26 (subj. God).
splash [[מוֹאָב בְּקִיאוֹ]] ´[[וְס]] Je 48:26 and Moab shall splash (fall with a splash) into his vomit, > Thes Buhl:Lex 13 empty himself (?), throw up (cf. syr. spq Pa.).
